Yarra City Council acknowledges the Wurundjeri Woi Wurrung people as the Traditional Owners and true sovereigns of the land now known as Yarra. We also acknowledge the significant contributions made by other Aboriginal and Torres Strait Islander people to life in Yarra. We pay our respects to Elders from all nations - and to their Elders past, present and future.

  3. Planning decisions committee

Planning decisions committee

Tuesday 28 May 2024

The Planning Decisions Committee is a delegated committee of Council with full authority to make decisions in relation to planning matters. The committee is made up of three Councillors who are rostered on a rotating basis.

Planning Decisions Committee meetings are decision-making forums and only Councillors have a formal role. However, Council is committed to ensuring that both applicants and objectors are able to communicate their views by addressing the Committee before the decision is made.

Watching the meeting

You are welcome to attend the meeting to watch proceedings, and there is no need to register in advance.

Addressing the Committee

If you wish to address the Committee at the meeting, you must:

  • be the applicant or an objector (only formal parties may address the meeting)
  • register by 6.30pm on the day before the meeting (late registrations cannot be accepted)
  • be in attendance (you cannot present remotely or submit something in writing to be read at the meeting)

When you register, you will receive an email with instructions on how to participate. You will have an opportunity to address the Councillors for up to five minutes.

Register to address the Committee

If you are having difficulties registering for the meeting online, please contact Council on 9205 5555 and ask for the Governance team. 

Contacting the Councillors

Once the meeting agenda has been published below, you will be able to see which Councillors are rostered to attend the meeting. If you wish to contact the Councillors before the meeting, you will find their contact details here. 

Meeting agenda

The meeting agenda will be available below on the Wednesday before the meeting.

  • Item 61 Attachment 1 223229 Johnston Street 369 Gore Street Fitzroy Site Location Plan (261.04KB / PDF )
  • Item 61 Attachment 2 223229 Johnston Street 369 Gore Street Fitzroy Decision Plans (3.7MB / PDF )
  • Item 61 Attachment 3 223229 Johnston Street 369 Gore Street Fitzroy Planning Permit Amended (156.48KB / PDF )
  • Item 61 Attachment 4 223229 Johnston Street 369 Gore St Fitzroy Endorsed Demolition Plan Conditi (633.42KB / PDF )
  • Item 6_1 Attachment 5 IREF2400276 Internal Referral Response Heritage (180.98KB / PDF )
  • Item 61 Attachment 6 CREF2400050 Referral Response Structural Engineer PSP (21.36MB / PDF )
  • PDC Agenda Tuesday 28 May 2024 (1.38MB / PDF )

Location

Richmond Town Hall

Date and time:
6:30pm
Tuesday 28 May 2024


Address:
333 Bridge Road Richmond
